AddonDescription.message: Der schlaue RSS Feed und Nachrichten Client.

ShortcutSidebar.message: Öffnen der Seitenleiste mit 'Strg + Shift + B'
ShortcutSidebar.description: Text for keyboard shortcut to active or deactivate the sidebar

RSSupdateTitle.description: Notification title for updated RSS feed

RSSupdateInformation.description: Notifcation message that URI was updated.

RSSupdateFailTitle.description: Notification title for failing RSS feed update

RSSupdateInformationFail.description: Notifcation message that URI update failed.

titleFeedOverviewFeed.description: Information that a new feed section started

switchReaderMode.description: Action button to toggle single reader mode

howToSingleRow.message: Wenn der Lesemodus aktiv ist, kann mittels der Pfeiltasten Links und Rechts durch die Feeds vorwärts oder zurück gesprungen werden.

thunderNoteEnable.description: Select title to enable thunderNote news fetching

thunderNoteDisable.description: Select title to stop news fetching thunderNote

thunderNoteStatusTitle.description: Select title to stop news fetching thunderNote

thunderNoteEnabled.description: Notification message that thunderNote is started.

thunderNoteDisabled.description: Notification message that thunderNote is stopped.

contextMenuAddKeyword.description: Context menu entry to add a keyword

buttonAddURI.description: Interface button, add URI to watchlist

buttonUpdateURI.description: Interface button to update existing URI

buttonUpdateAllUri.description: Interface button to force refreshing all URIs

buttonForceURIUpdate.description: Interface button to force URI update

maxAgeURI.message: Maximales Alter von Nachrichten in Tagen
maxAgeURI.description: Placeholder for number of days to keep news items

maxAgeURIPlaceholder.message: Maximales Alter von Nachrichen: Von 0 bis 120 Tage (0 = Unbegrenzt)
maxAgeURIPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for number of days to keep news items

noTopics.description: Information shown if no topics are found

noKeywords.description: Information shown if no keywords are set

noFeeds.description: Information shown that no feeds are set

noFeedItems.description: Information shown that no items are found in feeed

addKeywordBody.description: Notifcation message which keyword was added

buttonRemoveURI.description: Interface button, delete URI from watchlist

buttonViewTopics.description: Interface button, view topics by keywords

buttonViewFeeds.description: Interface button, view all of feeds

labelManage.description: Label for manage feeds and keywords

addURItypeRSS.description: RSS feed selection feed type label

addURIinterval.description: Information about fetch interval placeholder range

addURIintervalPlaceholder.description: Information about fetch interval title range

optionsBodyImagesEnabled.description: Notifications body image display in news enabled

optionsBodyImagesDisabled.message: thunderNote zeigt nun keine Bilder mehr an
optionsBodyImagesDisabled.description: Notifications body image display in news disabled
